answers.answer: Oh I envy you! I wish mine would go. You could have just been very hydrated today that helps with swelling. Also it can depend on the shoes you were wearing! I've had bad swelling hands, feet and a little in the face with this pregnancy and the last but I've got preeclampsia with both

question: Hi ladies,im 36w 4d and my very swollen feet of that last 4 or so weeks have completely disappeared (and i have been on my feet for a fair amount today!) Anyone know how this could be?I was expecting blown-up balloon sized feet this evening and nothing :O
title: any idea?
